name: Excel Content Sync
description: Sync multi-language content from Excel to Sketch
author: Wouter Bron

commands.name: Select Content Document...
commands.description: Select the Excel or CSV file that contains the content.

commands.name: Sync Current Page...
commands.description: Sync content from a Excel document to this page.

commands.name: Sync All Pages...
commands.description: Sync content from a Excel document to all pages (except Symbols).

commands.name: Generate Content Document...
commands.description: Generate a Excel document with keys and values from the current Sketch document.

commands.name: Report Issue or Feedback
commands.description: Report Issue, Feedback or Feature on Github.
